name: Slebbles
description:
A puzzle-platformer about a young scientist who enters an unexplored forest, but who or what inhabits this forest and what new discoveries will be made.

Important: You can press the 'R' key to restart a level, even if you think you are stuck.

Controls are WASD and the space bar to move, and you can drop anything you are holding by pressing 'P'

Enjoy!
